events.message: doc: update maintainer list in REVIEWERS

events.body: Should @jonasschnelli's key `32EE5C4C3FA15CCADB46ABE529D4BCB6416F53EC` and @meshcollider's key `CA03882CB1FC067B5D3ACFE4D300116E1C875A3D` be also removed from [contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys)?

> See [bitcoin-core/bitcoincore.org#876](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoincore.org/pull/876) on the process

Thanks! But https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoincore.org/pull/876 does not touch [contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys) in _this_ repo.
Right, someone would need to open a pull request.

> Right, someone would need to open a pull request.

Done in #25197.
